nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Seismic alert! The primary chamber's support lattice is failing. Structural collapse is imminent. Multiple egress routes are available, but degrading rapidly.

choices.text: [Reconnaissance] Maya, project the routes. Give me probabilities.
Chen, what's your assessment? Can we shore it up?
[Previous Loop] "Forget the main routes. There's a maintenance conduit behind that altar. It'll hold."

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Projecting. Route Alpha: direct, but crosses a primary stress fracture. 60% chance of further collapse. Route Beta: longer, through the old servitor tunnels. Slower, but structurally more sound. High probability of encountering dormant security mechs.

nodes.speaker: engineer_chen
nodes.body_language: Chen is already running calculations on their datapad, face grim.
nodes.text: Shore it up? Negative, Captain. It's a cascade failure. We could try to divert power to the secondary supports, create a temporary bottleneck to slow the collapse rate, but it would take time andâ€”

choices.text: [Interrupt] We don't have time for 'maybes', Chen. Give me an escape route, now!

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: A conduit? How do you know that, Captain? Never mind. If you're sure, we follow. Let's move!

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: The ground is shaking, Captain! Dust is raining from the ceiling. We need to go!

choices.text: [Athletics] We're taking the direct route. Everyone, run!
[Engineering] The servitor tunnels. Chen, lead the way. Clear any obstructions.
[Crew: Torres+Chen] Torres, you lay down suppressing fire on the ceiling to slow the debris fall. Chen, you guide us through the safest path. Move!

nodes.speaker: engineer_chen
nodes.text: ...it would require rerouting main power, which would leave us without scanners or internal comms for the duration of the escape. It's risky, but it's the 'safest' option in terms of avoiding the collapse itself.

choices.text: Do it. The silence will be unnerving, but better than being crushed.
No, I'm not running blind. We'll find another way.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: We made it! That was too close. Adrenaline's pumping, but we're clear!

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Warning! The stress fracture gave way! Torres is hit! Heavy debris!

nodes.speaker: engineer_chen
nodes.text: The final bulkhead is open. We are through. The main chamber has completely collapsed behind us. My route was effective.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: The servitor tunnels are not as stable as anticipated. A dormant security turret has activated due to the vibrations!

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Torres's covering fire strategically weakens the ceiling, diverting the main collapse, while Chen's guidance allows you to weave through the falling debris with expert precision.

nodes.speaker: engineer_chen
nodes.text: Rerouting now. Comms and sensors going dark... mark. May God have mercy on our souls. Follow the light of my torch.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.body_language: Torres is pinned under a massive rock, their leg bent at an unnatural angle.
nodes.text: Aargh! Don't... don't wait for me! Get out of here, Captain!

choices.text: [Second Thoughts] I'm sorry, Torres. I can't risk the rest of the crew.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: Contact! Automated turret, ten o'clock! It's locking on!

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Power returning. We are clear of the collapse zone. Chen's gambit paid off.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: With a surge of adrenaline, you heave the rock aside. You half-carry, half-drag Torres through the exit just as it seals shut.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: A harrowing, close-shave escape, but you made it.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: A methodical and safe escape. You avoided the worst of the danger.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Your expert use of your crew's talents resulted in a flawless escape.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Your knowledge of past timelines provided a secret path to safety.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Running silent and dark was a huge risk, but it paid off.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You escaped, but the cost was high. The loss of Torres will haunt you.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: The 'safe' route proved to be a deathtrap. You were cut down by ancient defenses.
